===Friendly Fracas===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Zhongli)
:{{A|vo card zhongli invite easy 01.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' The mechanisms of this card game... Hmm, they should be comparable to the conventions of chess.
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Adjust the deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Zhongli's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card zhongli ingame easy 02.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' Hmm... An oversight on my part.

;(When the player defeats two of Zhongli's  Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card zhongli ingame easy 03.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' The outcome is yet to be determined.

;(When Zhongli defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card zhongli ingame easy 01.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' A fortuitous move.

;(When Zhongli uses an Elemental Burst)
:{{A|vo card zhongli ingame easy 04.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' Let me put this move to the test.

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card zhongli invite easy 02.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' It looks like I've played all my pieces... ahem, cards right.

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card zhongli invite easy 03.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' I humbly admit defeat.
{{Dialogue End}}

===Serious Showdown===
{{Dialogue Start}}
;(Talk to Zhongli)
:{{A|vo card zhongli invite hard 01.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' There's nothing like enjoying a most serendipitous encounter with a few games of chess... Let us begin.
:{{DIcon|TCG}} Let's play Genius Invokation TCG.
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG match interface)
:{{DIcon}} Adjust the deck first...
:;(Open Genius Invokation TCG deck interface)
:{{DIcon}} I've got other things to do right now...

;(When the player defeats one of Zhongli's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card zhongli ingame hard 02.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' The occasional error is not to be avoided...

;(When the player defeats two of Zhongli's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card zhongli ingame hard 03.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' The prospects are still positive.

;(When Zhongli defeats one of the player's Character Cards)
:{{A|vo card zhongli ingame hard 01.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' An occurrence by chance.

;(When Zhongli uses an Elemental Burst)
:{{A|vo card zhongli ingame hard 04.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' Make no hasty conclusions.

;(If the player loses the match)
:{{A|vo card zhongli invite hard 02.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' Card games and chess share many principles. Moments of indecision will often cost you the victory.

;(If the player wins the match)
:{{A|vo card zhongli invite hard 03.ogg}} '''Zhongli:''' The outcome of a card game can be hard to predict... It seems like my preparations were inadequate.
{{Dialogue End}}
